posts.post_content:
I have a PSA 4(MC) Tolstoi Josh Devore with "Devore" printed on top and bottom. I know there are a few double name collectors on here, and this is a super clean example.

Feel free to PM with any questions or to request additional photos. Asking $SOLD.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=629755&d=1722353859[/IMG]
